text_content: Harry apologized for short notice and asked if you could reschedule the meeting to Monday after 3 pm, Tuesday, or Wednesday.
You confirmed your availability for Monday after 3 pm.
Harry rescheduled the meeting for 4:30 pm ET on Monday.

task.name: Check for internships
task.description: Browse job postings to check for summer internships

steps.title: Check summer 2026
steps.description: Navigate to https://github.com/vanshb03/Summer2026-Internships and check the readme for new postings

steps.title: Check spring 2026
steps.description: Navigate to https://github.com/vanshb03/Summer2026-Internships/blob/dev/OFFSEASON_README.md and check for new internships

task.name: Calculate earnings for the past quarter
task.description: Open the spreadsheet and calculate the past quarter earnings

steps.title: Open Earnings Q2 2025 Spreadsheet
steps.description: Open the excel spreadsheet titled earnings_q2_2025

steps.title: Calculate the gross income
steps.description: Subtract the cost and earnings from the revenue to get the gross income

task.name: Send weekly check in email to Steve
task.description: Send your weekly check in email for what you accomplished to Steve.

steps.title: Send the email
steps.description: Write the weekly check in email and send it to steve@company.com

task.name: Submit hours to Luke
task.description: Submit weekly hours to Luke Sutor via Slack workspace

steps.title: Create PDF
steps.description: Create a PDF document titled "lastname_firstname_hours_dd_mm_yy" with your weekly hours

steps.title: Send PDF to Luke
steps.description: Send the PDF document you just created to Luke Sutor on Slack by attaching it to a message

task.name: Update the end of day reports
task.description: Use the end of day report information to update the master spreadsheet.

steps.title: Download the report
steps.description: Download the end of day report from Google Drive

steps.title: Copy data
steps.description: Copy the report data into the master excel file titled "daily_reports_master"
